name: 4th International Conference on Future of Social Sciences
content: Welcome to The 4th International Conference on Future of Social Sciences (ICFSS) Conference, which will be held on September 17-19, 2021 in Nice, France. ICFSS 2021 aims to bring together academia, researchers and scholars to exchange information and share experiences and research results about all aspects of specialized and interdisciplinary fields. This event provides an opportunity for all to network, share ideas and present their research to a worldwide community. Discussion on the latest innovations, trends and practical concerns and challenges faced in these fields are also encouraged.
